attributes.action: personally visit every family of our armed forces killed in iraq and afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair ought to be ashamed of the fact that he has not made it his personal responsibility to visit each and every family of all our troops killed in this phoney war in iraq and afghanistan.  Our brave armed forces are out there on his orders, he should show them the respect they deserve and at the very least apologise to their families and show that he cares.
